sentences.en: A stag, one summer's day, came to a pool to quench his thirst.
sentences.cn: 夏季里有一天, 一只公鹿来到池边喝水.

sentences.en: Jack says he goes stag every Saturday night.
sentences.cn: 杰克说他每个星期六晚上都去跳舞,但是不带女伴.

sentences.en: Jack went stag to the dance.
sentences.cn: 杰克不带女伴去参加舞会.

sentences.en: She asked, " What was the purpose of a stag party? "
sentences.cn: [ 单身汉聚会的目的何在 ]?

sentences.en: Stag parties cease to be fun after a while.
sentences.cn: 清一色的男子汉聚会没过多久就变得索然无味了.

sentences.en: Stag, Hart , Buck and Deer - Policy, Peace and Harmony.
sentences.cn: 雄鹿(包括牡鹿 、 赤鹿等) - 策略 、 和平、和谐.

sentences.en: The hounds followed the stag's scent.
sentences.cn: 那群猎犬循臭味追寻牡鹿.

sentences.en: The hounds will soon hunt down the stag.
sentences.cn: 猎狗很快就会追到那头牡鹿.

sentences.en: The stag at bay is a dangerous foe.
The symbols of Apollo were the wolf, swan, raven, stag, dolphin, laurel, and lyre.
sentences.cn: 阿波罗的象征物是狼 、 天鹅 、 渡鸦 、 雄鹿 、 海豚 、 桂冠和竖琴.

sentences.en: They showed some blue videos at Joe's stag party.
sentences.cn: 他们在乔举行的男子交际会上放映一些黄色录像.

sentences.en: This story gave rise to the idiom A Stag A Horse.
sentences.cn: 成语“指鹿为马”就是根据这个故事得来的.

sentences.en: We're going to have a stag party this weekend.
sentences.cn: 这个周末我们准备来一次男人的聚会.

sentences.en: Would you accept my invitation to a stag party?
sentences.cn: 你会接受我的邀请来参加男人聚会 吗 ?

words.tran_cn: 老练的人；演员；经验丰富的人

trans.tran_cn: 成年牡鹿，阉过的雄畜[牛，猪]，[商]非会员股票经纪人，非真心投资，遇有利机会即行出售股票的认股者
